fields.name: Volcanic Blaze Chicken Wings
fields.description: 6 INCLUDED: Experience the intense heat and explosive flavor of our Volcanic Blaze Chicken Wings. These wings are not for the faint of heart but are sure to satisfy spice enthusiasts.

fields.name: Mushroom Cheese Pizza
fields.description: Enjoy a WHOLE pie of perfect mushroom cheese pizza served with a side of MUSIC
